alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:38PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Simpson and Copiah Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Water inundates some lowland and agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 22 feet and near crest. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near flood stage overnight into Wednesday morning and fall below flood stage by early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 22 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Monticello 22.0 22.0 Tue 8 pm CDT 21.9 21.6 21.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
